author: ceki
msg: Changed LoggingEvent fields to be either private or public final instead of all public.
Components using LoggingEvent needed to be slightly modified.

author: ceki
msg: Updated Category.java to use ClassLoader.getSystemResource in its static initializer.
This is much better than the silly stuff we did before.
LoggingEvent now supports serialization of priorities derived from org.apache.log4j.Priority.

author: ceki
msg: Shallow.java can now be configured with an XML file.
Moved the *.xml files to xml subdirectory.
